room_title: Escape room "Chamber of Illusions" by Enter the Imaginarium in Pittsburgh
review: Absolutely amazing!! Went with family and everybody had a blast! The props, the set-up and the employee's, absolutely made it a wonderful experience!! Would highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Chamber of Illusions" by Enter the Imaginarium in Pittsburgh
review: Phenomenal set-up, impressive staging and props. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to expand their mind and disrupt their normal routine.

room_title: Escape room "Chamber of Illusions" by Enter the Imaginarium in Pittsburgh
review: Best in Pittsburgh! Bring your brain!After doing 10+ escape rooms, none compare to Enter the Imaginarium. The sets are awesome and the experience starts as soon as you walk through the front doors.

room_title: Escape room "Chamber of Illusions" by Enter the Imaginarium in Pittsburgh
review: An amazingly immersive escape room. Pay attention to the story as you go! You're certain to have a great time whether you escape or not, it's just so cool!

room_title: Escape room "Chamber of Illusions" by Enter the Imaginarium in Pittsburgh
review: Had an absolute blast! I loved the Chamber of Illusions. Production values were top notch and the puzzles ranged from medium to super tricky. It's great that "the voice" was there to give subtle hints if necessary.
